title: Characteristics of nonconventional hydrogen bonds and stability of dimers of chalcogenoaldehyde derivatives: a noticeable role of oxygen compared to other chalcogens
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14114-14125
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01837K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Le Thi Tu Quyen, Bui Nhat Tung, Pham Ngoc Thach, Nguyen Ngoc Tri, Nguyen Tien Trung
The blue-shift is found in the Csp2–H⋯O hydrogen bond, while the red-shift is observed in Csp2–H⋯S/Se/Te ones.
